description: Manage the certificate root-authority for an IoT Hub instance.

commands.name: az iot hub certificate root-authority set
commands.summary: Set the certificate root-authority for an IoT Hub instance to a specific version.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub certificate root-authority set --cav {v1, v2}
                                          --hub-name
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--yes {false, true}]
examples: az iot hub certificate root-authority set --hub-name {iothub_name} --certificate-authority v2
az iot hub certificate root-authority set --hub-name {iothub_name} --certificate-authority v1

commands.name: az iot hub certificate root-authority show
commands.summary: Show the current certificate root-authority for an IoT Hub instance.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub certificate root-authority show --hub-name
                                           [--resource-group]
examples: az iot hub certificate root-authority show --hub-name {iothub_name}
